sentences.sContent: There is also reason to think that our penchant for makingunhealthy choices might be enhanced by the abundance of particularfoods.
sentences.sContent_eng: There is also reason to think that our penchant for makingunhealthy choices might be enhanced by the abundance of particularfoods.
sentences.sCn: 我们也有理由认为，我们做出不健康选择的倾向，也许被大量特定食物加强了。

remMethod.val: pench(=pend挂) + ant → 对…挂着一颗心 → 爱好
